solution_line_template: Between grapes and mangoes, we have {grapes_crates}+{mangoes_crates} =<<{grapes_crates}+{mangoes_crates}={other_fruits_total}>>{other_fruits_total} crates.

The remaining crates are passion fruits, so we have {total_crates_per_week}-{other_fruits_total}=<<{total_crates_per_week}-{other_fruits_total}={passion_fruit_crates}>>{passion_fruit_crates} crates of passion fruit
